channel.title: Online help
channel.description:
Ok guys so i need help with putting my server online...
I have portforwarded, and done all the stuff, but it still says its offline... please post on how to help.!!
Really no1 wants to help?

item.title: Online help
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

jmk600:

I have a Broadband usb connection, i cant do that so i use utorrent.

I’m not exactly sure what uTorrent does, nobody really explained it, and I have it.

I think you need a router to portforward.

Sorry Dastan_, I didn’t see that one, I originally went into Client Help and saw this topic was moved and it’s recent, so I commented on it, trying to help this guy.

Read full topic

item.title: Online help
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“jmk600, post:1, topic:368461”]Ok guys so i need help with putting my server online…

I have portforwarded, and done all the stuff, but it still says its offline… please post on how to help.!!

Really no1 wants to help?[/quote]

Make sure it isn’t port triggered, that makes it go online and offline at random times.

I figured that out after 8 months of getting pointed at and laughed at by a lot of queers saying “It doesn’t go online and offline when it pleases, you just turn it on and off” k that makes perfect sense for me to turn my own server on and off at random times.

…And also make sure you’re properly portforwarded port 43594, TCP, and clicked enable… Here’s a screenshot of my router’s.

Read full topic
